Instantly connect with your  customers

Introducing Hazi, the all-in-one communication platform that uses the power of AI to streamline your business communication!

Create Account

Our Services

The Services we offer are specifically designed to meet your needs.

Simple Intergration

Seamlessly integrate with your current systems through our API management platform, ensure the same communication is easily maintained in your different points of communication

Email and campaigns

Create custom campaigns and send as many emails as you need per month to your farmers, making it easy to send out important information.

Instant access

Reserve your access credentials and immediately interact with your audiences through our customized campaigns and templates on the platform.

Contact Management

Upload your contacts list without having to update it manually every time you initiate a campaign

Reports

Assess the efficiency of your campaigns by retrieving the history log of your messages and tracking their delivery status. Receive reports on the different campaigns executed

SMS & USSD

Send out informational SMS to farmers and provide custom USSD training to support your farmers at any time.

Why Us ?

Hazi lets you manage all your conversations in one place.

Our communication platform offers global coverage, efficient routes, flexible pricing, and seamless integration with minimal management effort. With immediate message delivery and receipt, you can enhance user experiences and engage with customers worldwide. Choose our packages that fit every budget and business need, and stay ahead of the competition.

  • Extended Coverage
  • Quality
  • Available & Scalable
  • Cost Efficient
